message:
Implement auto-fork system for deck templates

- Add has_local_changes field to track fork modifications
- Users now automatically get forked copies of system decks on signup/login
- Remove system deck visibility - users only see their own forked copies
- Update functions mark content changes (name, description, prompts) as local_changes
- Preference changes (enabled, order) don't trigger has_local_changes flag
- Fix database deadlock in auto_fork_system_decks
- Add deck/voice enable/disable toggle UI
- Update App.tsx to reload voices after deck/voice updates

Breaking change: Users no longer see system decks directly
Prepares for future deck store with upstream sync mechanism
